text: Roc is an American television sitcom which ran on Fox from August 1991 to May 1994. ==Series overview== ==List of episodes== ===Season 1 (1991–92)=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:100%; background:#fff;" |- ! style="background:#A68AC5;"| No. overall ! style="background:#A68AC5;"| No. in season ! style="background:#A68AC5;"| Title ! style="background:#A68AC5;"| Directed by ! style="background:#A68AC5;"| Written by ! style="background:#A68AC5;"| Original airdate |} === Season 2 (1992–93)=== All 25 episodes are aired live to viewers in the Eastern and Central time zones. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:100%; background:#fff;" |- ! style="background:#FF6054;"| No. overall ! style="background:#FF6054;"| No. in season ! style="background:#FF6054;"| Title ! style="background:#FF6054;"| Directed by ! style="background:#FF6054;"| Written by ! style="background:#FF6054;"| Original airdate |} ===Season 3 (1993–94)=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:100%; background:#fff;" |- ! style="background:#ec7f70;"| No. overall ! style="background:#ec7f70;"| No. in season ! style="background:#ec7f70;"| Title ! style="background:#ec7f70;"| Directed by ! style="background:#ec7f70;"| Written by ! style="background:#ec7f70;"| Original airdate |} Category:Lists of American sitcom episodes
